title: not possible to modify a txt file ie8
body:
### expected behaviour
when you open txt file (that it is not empty) on owncloud, it should be possible to edit it

### actual behaviour
by accessing to a txt file on ie8 it is not possible to edit the file

### steps to reproduce
1. log in to oc using ie8
2. click on an existing txt file, not empty
3. once we are on the edit screen, it is possible for us to see the file, but not possible to edit it. 
4. neither it is possible to save it

### server configuration

web server: 
acceptance testing, "version":"4.93.10","versionstring":"5.0 beta 1
master_on_apache_with_sqlite

### client configuration
browser: ie8

operating system: windows 7
